# NSCloudSharingValidation

**Protocol**

A protocol that a Cloud-sharing toolbar item uses to get validation of an item.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSCloudSharingValidation : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Getting an item’s Cloud share

- **cloudShare(for:)**: Returns the Cloud share object that corresponds to the specified item, if one exists.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol

items.description: Returns the Cloud share object that corresponds to the specified item, if one exists.
items.name: cloudShare(for:)
